definition: (law) a conditional release from imprisonment that entitles the person to serve the remainder of the sentence outside the prison as long as the terms of release are complied with, release a criminal from detention and place him on parole
details:
noun
- (law) a conditional release from imprisonment that entitles the person to serve the remainder of the sentence outside the prison as long as the terms of release are complied with
- a secret word or phrase known only to a restricted group
= synonyms: word, countersign, password, watchword
- a promise
= synonyms: word, word of honor
verb
- release a criminal from detention and place him on parole
= example: release a criminal from detention and place him on parole
